::DarkMouse::

*She dreams that she is fighting the Maximals.  She sees Megatron and Hell 
Beast yelling at her to kill all the Maximals.  She then sees herself 
walking towards her.  She sees herself draw a sword and start to attack.  
She draws her own sword and starts fighting with herself.

"Why are you doing this." She asks her other.  The other replies,"You have 
gone against your Predacon training.  Why did you go against the Predacons?" 
  She responds,"Because they kill without reason.  They kill just to kill."
Her other hits her and yells," You once killed for the thrill of killing.  
You used to revel in the fact that you had the power over life and death."
"Well, I don't anymore." She responded.
Her other stopped and stood next to her. "You might once again feel as you 
did.  Your a Predacon.  It's in your programming.  You will be a Predacon 
once again."

*DarkMouse yelled in her slumber*
"Noooo.  I will not give up. (mumble mumble mumble)"
